sentence.Network_cn: 长期 吸入被污染空气的影响还无从知晓.

entry.def: When you inhale, you breathe in. When you inhale something such as smoke, you take it into your lungs when you breathe in.

example.ex: He took a long slow breath, inhaling deeply...
example.tran: 他缓缓地深吸了一口气。

example.ex: He was treated for the effects of inhaling smoke.
example.tran: 他因吸入烟尘而接受治疗。
